alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 5:01AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 530 AM EDT/430 AM CDT/... At 500 AM EDT/400 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Callaway, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Altha, Nixon, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Red Oak, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Chason, Bayou George, Chipola, Camps Head, Kennys Mill, Willis, Youngstown, Cairo, Frink, Kinard, Blountstown Airport and Broad Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
